main event: A bright light and unidentified object were observed in Springfield, Missouri on November 11, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as egg-shaped with a size of 12" x 16",It emitted a drifting sound and was silvery low,The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds before the object faded out of view,The observer was driving and noted no stars were visible at the time of the sighting,The incident was documented in a Project 10073 record card and involved a potential light or flare.
witness description: Civilian who was driving a car.
